reviewText: Here's an interesting take on Jekyll / Hyde. The script is imaginative and well done. A worthy Hammer release that id definitely worth watching. Note that this can be played only on a computer or a region-free DVD player (which are not expensive and Amazon has a number of them). I didn't quite give 5 stars because the end gets a bit drawn out but doesn't ruin it. I would still recommend it.
I remember when it first came out, I read about it in a monster magazine. I finally found the VHS of this movie and now I have it on DVD. Now I have completed my Jykle & Hyde collection!
DVD player and play station cannot read disc
